XenotypeDef.label: minotaur
XenotypeDef.description: Born from the world of New Crete, the minotaur xenotype claim their name and likeness from the ancient myth of Earth's past. This bovid xenotype, while cosmetically a radical departure from baseline humanity, is more alike to baseliners than most of the more baseline-looking varieties of post-human in the galaxy.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A bovine-appearing xenotype that originate from New Crete. They are mechanically identical to baseliners, despite their radical aesthetic departure from baseline humanity.
